events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your profile and will assist you throughout the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, demonstrating a strong understanding of software development concepts.
Thank you for promptly responding to our follow-up questions and confirming your availability for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next Wednesday at 10 AM; please prepare for coding exercises and problem-solving discussion.
